content: knituli delicate web socks abbreviations bor = beginning of round co = cast on rs = right side ws = wrong-side row rs = row will face the front row ws = row will face the wrong side sl1 = slip_stitch sts = stitches k1 = knit one stitch p1 = purl one stitch p2tog = to purl two stitches together at the same time k2tog = to knit two stitches at the same time k2 p2 = knit two stitches purl two stitches ssk = slip slip knit round = round s sized one size european size 37-39 gauge 45 sts x 48 rnds = 10 x 10 cm needles circular needles 2 mm us0 yarn 100g of nord of drops or another simple yarn 45% alpaca 30% polyamide 25% wool 1 pattern cuff co 64 sts on 2 mm us0 circular needle join to work in round and place bor marker work *k2 p2* 20 rounds 4 cm next work in chart according on page 6 for 4 more times on around and for 4 or more times in height it s depends on how many centimeters in height you want the sock one pattern rapport is 3 cm in height heel valve the heel flap is then worked back and forth across 32 stitches while the remaining stitches remain on hold row 1 rs all loops are knitted to the last 2 loops knit the last two stitches together there are 31 loops on the knitting needle row2 is sl1 purl all stitches row 3 rs sl1 *sl1 k1* repeat 15 times ss1 p1 row 4 rs sl1 purl all stitches repeat row 3-4 fourteen more times the heel flap is 30 row in total and in the last thirtieth row you need to knit two loops together once so that there are 30 loops left on the knitting needle row30 sl1 p2tog 28 purl sts heel flap is 5 cm next shape the heel as follows row1 rs k19 ssk k1 turn work row2 ws sl1 p9 p2tog p1 turn work row3 rs sl1 k10 ssk k1 turn work 2 row4 ws sl1 p12 p2tog p1 turn work row5 rs sl1 k14 ssk k1 turn work row6 ws sl1 p16 p2tog p1 turn work row7 rs sl1 k18 ssk k1 turn work row8 ws sl1 p20 p2tog p1 turn work row9 rs sl1 k22 ssk k1 turn work row10 ws sl1 p24 p2tog p1 turn work row11 rs sl1 k23 you have 24 sts in total for the heel gusset next pick up sts on the sides of the heel flap and continue to work sock in the round round 1 pick up and k16 along side of heel flap work 32 sts row 1 in chart according on page 6 place bro marker pick up and k16 sts from along side of heel flap you have 84 sts in total 20+16+32+16 k36 you have 52 sts on the one needle 1 and 32 sts on
